name: Masters Arena
description:
Welcome to the arena. Fight for your base in this incredible MOBA.

CONTROLS:
  • WASD - MOVEMENT
  • SHIFT - SPRINT
  • LEFT CLICK - BASIC ATTACK
  • ALPHANUM (1-4) - ABILITIES (HOLD TO SHOW INDICADOR AND RELEASE TO ACTIVATE)
  • RIGHT CLICK - CANCEL INDICATOR
  • B - SHOP (OPEN AND CLOSE)
  •  Inside the shop:
    •   DOUBLE LEFT CLICK / RIGHT CLICK - BUY ITEM
    •   LEFT CLICK - SEE MORE INFO
  • RIGHT CLICK (In the inventory) - SELL ITEM
  • ESC - EXIT GAME MENU
Remember that this is only a demo and might have some bugs and issues. If you find one, report it in the discord server.
